summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Evolute Marketing website - all core functionality working correctly. Backend APIs, frontend navigation, contact form submission, and responsive design all tested successfully.
passed_tests: Contact form submission API (/api/contact POST) works correctly
Contact submissions retrieval API (/api/contact GET) works correctly
Status check endpoints (/api/status POST/GET) work correctly
Homepage loads with all sections (hero, about-snapshot, services-preview, process, trust, cta)
Navigation between all 5 pages (Home, About Us, Services, Why Choose Us, Contact) works
About Us page displays all content sections (company story, mission/vision/values, founder note, agency mindset)
Services page displays services grid correctly
Why Choose Us page displays 12 reason cards with hover effects
Contact form accepts input in all fields (name, email, phone, message)
Contact form submission integrates with backend and shows success message
Footer displays with correct contact information and links

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all major functionality working, minor navigation issue on mobile viewport transition)
